14 boost::shared_ptr<pcl::visualization::PCLVisualizer> PclFilters::visualize(pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZ>::Ptr cloud)
15 {
16  viewer.reset(new pcl::visualization::PCLVisualizer ("3D Viewer",false));
17  viewer->addPointCloud<pcl::PointXYZ> (cloud, "sample cloud");
18  viewer->initCameraParameters ();
19  return (viewer);
20 }
21 
22 boost::shared_ptr<pcl::visualization::PCLVisualizer> PclFilters::normalsVis(pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZ>::Ptr cloud, double radius, int numOfNormals)
23 {
24  viewer.reset(new pcl::visualization::PCLVisualizer ("3D Viewer",false));
25  viewer->addPointCloud<pcl::PointXYZ> (cloud, "sample cloud");
26  viewer->addPointCloudNormals<pcl::PointXYZ, pcl::Normal> (cloud, get_normals(cloud,radius), numOfNormals, 0.05, "normals");
27  viewer->setPointCloudRenderingProperties (pcl::visualization::PCL_VISUALIZER_COLOR, 1.0, 0.0, 0.0, "normals");
28  viewer->initCameraParameters ();
29  filteredCloud = cloud;
30  return (viewer);
31 }

34 {
35  return (visualize(passthrough(cloud,min,max,axis)));

58 pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZ>::Ptr PclFilters::get_filtered_cloud()
59 {
60  return filteredCloud;
61 }
62 
63 pcl::PointCloud<pcl::Normal>::Ptr PclFilters::get_normals(pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZ>::Ptr cloud, double radius)
64 {
65  pcl::PointCloud<pcl::Normal>::Ptr normals_out (new pcl::PointCloud<pcl::Normal>);
66  pcl::search::KdTree<pcl::PointXYZ>::Ptr tree (new pcl::search::KdTree<pcl::PointXYZ> ());
67  pcl::NormalEstimation<pcl::PointXYZ, pcl::Normal> norm_est;
68  norm_est.setSearchMethod(tree);
69  norm_est.setRadiusSearch (radius);
70  norm_est.setInputCloud (cloud);
71  //norm_est.setSearchSurface (cloud);
72  norm_est.compute (*normals_out);
73  return (normals_out);
74 }
75 
76 pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZ>::Ptr PclFilters::passthrough(pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZ>::Ptr cloud, double min, double max, std::string axis)
77 {
78  pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZ>::Ptr cloud_filtered (new pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZ>);
79  passfilter.setInputCloud(cloud);
80  passfilter.setFilterFieldName(axis);
81  passfilter.setFilterLimits(min,max);
82  passfilter.filter(*cloud_filtered);
83  filteredCloud = cloud_filtered;
84  return (cloud_filtered);
85 }
86 
87 pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZ>::Ptr PclFilters::voxelgrid(pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZ>::Ptr cloud, double lx, double ly, double lz)
88 {
89  pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZ>::Ptr cloud_filtered (new pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZ>);
90  voxelfilter.setInputCloud(cloud);
91  voxelfilter.setLeafSize(lx,ly,lz);
92  voxelfilter.filter(*cloud_filtered);
93  filteredCloud = cloud_filtered;
94  return (cloud_filtered);
95 }
96 
97 pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZ>::Ptr PclFilters::median(pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZ>::Ptr cloud, int window_size, double max_allowed_movement)
98 {
99  pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZ>::Ptr cloud_filtered (new pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZ>);
100  medianfilter.setInputCloud(cloud);
101  medianfilter.setWindowSize(window_size);
102  medianfilter.setMaxAllowedMovement(max_allowed_movement);
103  medianfilter.filter(*cloud_filtered);
104  filteredCloud = cloud_filtered;
105  return (cloud_filtered);
106 }
107 
108 pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZ>::Ptr PclFilters::shadowpoint(pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZ>::Ptr cloud, double threshold, double radius)
109 {
110  pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZ>::Ptr cloud_filtered (new pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZ>);
111  shadowpoint_filter.setInputCloud(cloud);
112  shadowpoint_filter.setThreshold(threshold);
113  shadowpoint_filter.setNormals(get_normals(cloud, radius));
114  shadowpoint_filter.filter(*cloud_filtered);
115  filteredCloud = cloud_filtered;
116  return (cloud_filtered);
117 }
118 
119 pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZ>::Ptr PclFilters::statistical_outlier(pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZ>::Ptr cloud, int meanK, double std_deviation_threshold)
120 {
121  pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZ>::Ptr cloud_filtered (new pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZ>);
122  //statistical_outlier_filter.setKeepOrganized(true);
123  statistical_outlier_filter.setInputCloud(cloud);
124  statistical_outlier_filter.setMeanK(meanK);
125  statistical_outlier_filter.setStddevMulThresh(std_deviation_threshold);
126  statistical_outlier_filter.filter(*cloud_filtered);
127  filteredCloud = cloud_filtered;
128  return (cloud_filtered);
129 }
130 }
